Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 1 - Palette Manager Reference /
Palette Manager Functions / Initializing the Palette Manager

PMgrVersion

Determines which version of the Palette Manager is executing; returns an integer specifying the version number.

pascal short PMgrVersion(void);
DISCUSSION
The values that the PMgrVersion function may return and their meaning are as follows:
ValueDescription
$0202System software version 7.0
$0201System software version 6.0.5
$0200Original 32-Bit QuickDraw system extension
